Class PriorityQueueManager<T>

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.scheduling.PriorityQueueManager<T>
public class PriorityQueueManager<T> extends Object
Priority Queue Manager for task scheduling. Features: - Multiple priority levels (CRITICAL, HIGH, NORMAL, LOW, BATCH) - Fair scheduling within priority levels - Starvation prevention with aging - Queue metrics and monitoring

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    PriorityQueueManager.PrioritizedItem<T>
    Wrapper for prioritized items with timestamp for aging.
    static enum 
    PriorityQueueManager.Priority
    Priority levels from highest to lowest.
